ygData.subject: Meetup at ApacheCon US 2009
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, I m coordinating a web crawler MeetUp at ApacheCon this November (Oakland, California). This will be a chance for developers of crawlers to discuss

Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset=US-ASCII;
	format=flowed;
	delsp=yes
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hi all,

I'm coordinating a web crawler MeetUp at ApacheCon this November  
(Oakland, California). This will be a chance for developers of  
crawlers to discuss technical challenges, find synergies, and swap war  
stories :)

I'm sending out a similar message to the dev lists for Nutch, Droids,  
and Bixo...any others?

Also, what evening works best for those who think they can make it?  
Andrzej Bialecki is giving his "Introduction to Nutch" talk on  
Thursday afternoon (3pm Nov 5th), so that same evening is the leading  
candidate.

Thanks,

-- Ken


--Apple-Mail-4-188077708
Content-Type: text/html;
	charset=US-ASCII
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

This will be a chance for developers of crawlers to discuss technical challenges, find synergies, and swap war stories :)<br><br>I'm sending out a similar message to the dev lists for Nutch, Droids, and Bixo...any others?<br><br>Also, what evening works best for those who think they can make it?
